TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A surgical procedure in which tissue or an organ is transferred from one area of a person’s body to another area, or from one person (the donor) to another person (the recipient).

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Procedimiento quirúrgico mediante el que se trasfiere tejido o un órgano de un área a otra del cuerpo o de una persona (el donante) a otra persona (el receptor).
